scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs vendor/twbs/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js src/js/scripts.js --compress --mangle --warn --output assets/js/main.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/admin/admin.js --compress --mangle --output assets/js/admin/admin.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/admin/login.js vendor/twbs/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js --compress --mangle --output assets/js/admin/login.min.js
